entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 2:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow at times heavy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
